channel.title: GFX Store [Wallpaper Backgrounds, Icons ect...]
channel.description:
Im thinking of opening a GFX Store to make some extra money, Do you guys think i could with things like this :D
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/189/neons.png/][IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/256/neons.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/593/creeperh.jpg/][IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/6266/creeperh.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: GFX Store [Wallpaper Backgrounds, Icons ect...]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Stiflex:

im kindoff a total noob at GFX, may i ask which program are you using? PS5?

Loool. He’s using modeling programs. If I had to guess, it would either be Maya or Cinema 4D.

item.title: GFX Store [Wallpaper Backgrounds, Icons ect...]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:7, topic:412795”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=514270.msg3734157#msg3734157 date=1314821322]

just thought i would let you know… if you want to show off something, NEVER post it on any mopar community lmao. they will make you feel worthless

Only when it is. These designs are very basic. If he wants to make money in photoshop he will need alot more practice. I took photoshop in college and had to re-create a entire landscape photo by scratch. It took around 40 hours (very intricate picture I chose). That picture had around 200 colors, and around 300 (or so) layers. Professionals can probably do this in minutes, along with any other photshop savy person.
[/quote]

thats nice, but the topic isnt about you.
its one thing to tell him he needs to improve, another thing to laugh at him and cut him down. and no one really “cut hims down” yet, but i know it will happen. and nothing is ever WORTHLESS. just because you would say it is, others might not. as long as he is putting max effort into, and he doesn’t think its worthless. it has some worth. maybe not alot, but its better then none.[/quote]

You just wrote a rant about something that hasn’t yet happened.

Read full topic

item.title: GFX Store [Wallpaper Backgrounds, Icons ect...]
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

in your eyes, its not worth anything. in his, it is. who says he didnt put any effort into these? just because this could take you 10 minutes doesnt mean it didnt take him 4 hours. hell, i suck at making art, but the stuff i put effort into could take some people 10 minutes to make. i still put effort, however.

Read full topic

its one thing to tell him he needs to improve, another thing to laugh at him and cut him down. and no one really “cut hims down” yet, but i know it will happen. and nothing is ever WORTHLESS. just because you would say it is, others might not. as long as he is putting max effort into, and he doesn’t think its worthless. it has some worth. maybe not alot, but its better then none.[/quote]
He’s trying to make money by putting in almost no effort. The images are really not worth anything, therefor worthless.
